price: আৰু পৃথিৱীসহ পৰ্বতসমূহক উঠাই নিয়া হ’ব আৰু মাত্ৰ এটা আঘাতত এইবোৰ চূৰ্ণ-বিচূৰ্ণ হৈ যাব।
arabic: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: waḥumilati al-arḍu wal-jibālu fadukkatā dakkatan wāḥidatan
